mapper.select: select stuprize.create_time time ,stuprize.id id, list.prize prizeName,list.exchange_prize gold, stuprize.state from student_exchange_prize stuprize join prize_exchange_list list on stuprize.prize_id = list.id where stuprize.student_id=#{studentId} order by stuprize.create_time desc limit #{start} ,#{number}
